cards.title: Argus
powers: Activate an operate text. Draw a card.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may draw a card.
One player  may play a card.
Reveal and replace the top card of the environment deck.

openingLines.default: Positions, everyone! I have overwatch on the situation!
openingLines.OblivAeonFrontPageCharacter: I can coordinate, but we'll need everyone together to win this one!

cards.title: Occulus Drone
powers: Reveal the top 2 cards of a deck. Put one on top of that deck and the other on the bottom.

activatableAbilities.name: operate
activatableAbilities.text: one player may draw a card

cards.flavorText: Long range, low profile, high-definition camera. Perfect.

cards.title: Security Drone

activatableAbilities.name: operate
activatableAbilities.text: increase the next damage dealt by {Argus} by 1

powers: {Argus} deals 1 target 1 projectile damage and 1 lightning damage.

cards.title: Sabotage Drone
cards.flavorText: Normally I clean up the messes. This will be an interesting change of pace.
powers: Destroy an ongoing or environment card.

cards.title: Repair Drone

activatableAbilities.name: operate
activatableAbilities.text: Move an equipment card from a player's trash to their hand

cards.flavorText: You're taking a blowtorch to my shield? I need that intact!
powers: Up to 2 hero targets regain 1 HP each.

cards.title: Command Drone

activatableAbilities.name: operate
activatableAbilities.text: one hero other than {Argus} may use a power now.

cards.flavorText: I'll just relax here and let the computer do the hard work.

cards.title: The Hundred Eyes

flavorQuotes.text: Not so clever without your toys.

powers: Search your deck for a camdrone card and put it into play. Shuffle your deck.

cards.title: Tactical Deployment
cards.flavorText: Hang tight, backup is just around the corner!
cards.body: Whenever a camdrone enters play, you may activate its operate text

cards.title: Hasty Formation
cards.flavorText: Smash those robots! Where do they keep coming from!
cards.body: Draw 2 cards. Play up to 2 camdrone cards. Activate up to 2 operate texts.

cards.title: Configure Drone
cards.flavorText: Hold on a second. This one just needs a little modification.
cards.body: Search your deck for a Camdrone card and put it into play. Shuffle your deck. You may use a power and activate an Operate text.

cards.title: Shock Tactics
cards.body: {Argus} deals 1 target 2 lightning damage. Activate 2 operate texts.

cards.title: Drone Bombardment
cards.body: Argus deals 1 target 1 projectile damage X times, where X is the number of camdrone cards in play.

cards.title: Scout Ahead
cards.flavorText: Before you all charge in, let me take a peek first.
cards.body: Draw a card. Reveal the top 2 cards of the environment deck. Put one on top and the other on the bottom. Activate an operate text.

cards.title: Rebuild and Reuse
cards.flavorText: They won't hold up long. Better act fast.
cards.body: Put up to two camdrone cards from your trash into play. Activate up to 2 operate texts.

cards.title: Semi-Autonomous Protocols
cards.flavorText: That's one upgrade that was sorely needed.
cards.body: At the end of your turn, you may activate an operate text.

cards.title: Drone Scan
cards.flavorText: Watch out, got a wrecked tanker ahead and to your left, and a pair of muggers stalking a civilian to the south.
cards.body: Draw 2 cards. If you have at least 3 camdrones in play, draw 2 more.

promoCards.title: Argus
powers: {Argus} deals himself 2 psychic damage. If he takes damage this way, draw a card, activate an operate text, and {Argus} deals 1 target 2 projectile damage.
incapacitatedAbilities: One hero may use a power.
One hero deals themselves 2 psychic damage. If they take damage this way, their player may draw a card and one player may play a card.

openingLines.default: Okay team! I'll hit them from above, you take them from below!
openingLines.HatterCharacter: You won't control anyone again. I'll stop you here and now!
openingLines.OblivAeonFrontPageCharacter: My drones don't stand a chance agaisnt something so powerful. I'll need to pull out all the stops here.
